Classes
Class
Description
ButtonEventHandler
The class that deals with button events
DrawCircle
The class that deals with drawing circles

The class that deals with pressing the mouse on the canvas
DrawRectangle
The class that deals with drawing rectangles
DrawTriangle
The class that deals with drawing triangles
DynamicCircle
The class for the circle drawn
DynamicRectangle
The class for the rectangle draw
DynamicTriangle
The class for the triangle drawn
Editor
Main class of the Editor program where every appliation object is defined
MenuHelpEventHandler
The class that deals with the "help" dialog window
MenuInfoEventHandler
The class that deals with the "info" dialog window
SelectShape
THe class that serves as a placeholder while the "select" state is active
StateAction
The class that serves as a parent for other classes describing the behaviour depending on the state
StateActionWrap
The wrapper class for the StateAction class
